## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.variablesdynamic.category_name.md) | String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with variable blocks. See also Blockly.Variables.CATEGORY\_NAME and Blockly.Procedures.CATEGORY\_NAME. |
